org.spongepowered.api.util.command.args

Class CommandContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.util.command.args.CommandContext

  • public final class CommandContext
extends Object
    Context that a command is executed in. This object stores parsed arguments from other commands

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommandContext()
      Create a new empty CommandContext.

      Perform a permissions check, throwing an exception if the required permissions are not present.

      Get all values for the given argument.

      Gets the value for the given key if the key has only one value.

      Returns whether this context has any value for the given argument key.

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        public <T> Collection<T> getAll(String key)
        Get all values for the given argument. May return an empty list if no values are present.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of value to get
        Parameters:
        key - The key to get values for
        Returns:
        the collection of all values

      • getOne

        public <T> Optional<T> getOne(String key)
        Gets the value for the given key if the key has only one value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the expected type of the argument
        Parameters:
        key - the key to get
        Returns:
        the argument

      • putArg

        public void putArg(String key,
                   Object value)
        Insert an argument into this context.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to store the arg under
        value - the value for this argument

      • checkPermission

        public void checkPermission(CommandSource commander,
                            String permission)
                     throws CommandException
        Perform a permissions check, throwing an exception if the required permissions are not present.
        Parameters:
        commander - the source to check against
        permission - The permission to check
        Throws:
        CommandException - if the source does not have permission

      • hasAny

        public boolean hasAny(String key)
        Returns whether this context has any value for the given argument key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to look up
        Returns:
        whether there are any values present
